mapper.insert: insert into REPLY(comment_no, board_no, c_user_id,c_postdate, comment_content, state) values(comment_seq.nextval, ${boardNo}, #{cUserId}, sysdate, #{commentContent}, 0)
mapper.select: select comment_no, board_no, c_user_id, c_postdate, comment_content, state from reply where board_no = #{boardNo} order by comment_no desc
